item.title: Recipe for your first online tutorial
item.description: The aim of this post is to provide a route map highlighting the resources available to generate your own tutorial and some considerations. Hello Last year I helped to build some free online tutorials using Ines Montani Framework. After one busy year that included the end of my PhD finally I have some time to make a contribution to the community about how to build these tutorials.
